>3. Create your own documentary. If you want this documentary to not be
>taken seriously and you want people to know the correct information, then
>create a documentary with the correct information. Talking among ourselves
>about how much of a fraud Hayes is does not solve the problem that this
>documentary is out there and spreading inferior information.

create your own documentary on ninja?, I apologize but it would be..
completely stupid. if anyone knows ANYTHING true on ninjas and understood
the philosophy of being one would never make a documentary on them if he
really understood anything about it. the way of ninja has nothing similar
to truth, and to know really what is ninja history and philosophy means
eventually become one and this is incompatible to the.. information
spreading of documentaries. 

and to all kids that wants to be ninjas to be 'cool' know that be a ninja
means tell to nobody, act normally, give completely NO clue being a ninja,
suicide if you give any slight clue (or kill anyone suspecting), laugh
heartely at people saying anything on ninja beliving firmly that ninjas
does NOT exist and are simply an invention of hyped childs, officially
derespect ninjas and anything related, and finally do NOT do anything
ninja-like in public for any reason or purpose, and repeating to yourself
100 times per day at the mirror 'ninja doesn't exist they are fraud and
they aren't cool, they suck'. if you meet all this you made the first step
of be a ninja :P

second step is talk of ninjas ever again!

trird step... nothing because of course ninja doesn't exist :)
